In today‚Äôs #JECHearing, Chairman @SenMikeLee referenced our Social Capital Project‚Äôs research on prime-age men who are out of the labor force. One-third of these men have been incarcerated.

"I wish to point out just one of these gaps... I refer here to the virtual absence in our national statistical compendia of facts and figures about the country‚Äôs arrested and sentenced populations." - @AEI's Nicholas Eberstadt
